tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    identity_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE identity_information (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    is_verified BOOLEAN,
    verification_date TIMESTAMP,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_number VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE identity_information (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passport_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
    driver_license_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
    social_security_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE identity_verification (
    verification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    verification_type VARCHAR(50),
    verification_status VARCHAR(50),
    verification_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE governance_processes (
    process_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(100),
    process_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participant_votes (
    vote_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    vote_decision VARCHAR(10),
    vote_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES governance_processes(process_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);
